name: 27NewsNOW-WKOW
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The 27 News Now app from WKOW has you covered on all things news, weather and sports in Madison and all of South Central Wisconsin. Find local and national news, 27 StormTrack Weather for your community, live streaming news, video, breaking news, Wisconsin sports coverage of the Badgers, Packers and Brewers plus local high school sports coverage.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
